detaileddescription.para: Whether to do horizontal flips.
Whether to do vertical flips.
Range in degrees for rotations (0-180).
Range (fraction of total width) for horizontal shifts.
Range (fraction of total height) for vertical shifts.
Shear angle (radians).
Whether to normalize to 0 mean.
Whether to normalize to unit variance.
Whether to scale to [0, 1].
Whether to normalize via z-score.
Whether to do random horizontal flips.
Whether to do random vertical flips.
Do random rotations up to range degrees (0-180).
Do random horizontal shifts up to range (fraction of image width).
Do random vertical shifts up to range (fraction of image height).
Do random shears up to range (radians).
Whether to subtract the sample-wise mean.
Whether to normalize to unit variance, sample-wise.
Whether to scale to [0, 1] (assumes max value is 255).
Whether to normalize by z-scores, sample-wise. This and mean subtraction/unit variance are mutually exclusive.
Disable all data augmentation.
Add noise to data (disable by default) noise_factor control the ammount of noise to be set to a value above zero but less than 1 (say 0.5)

memberdef.argsstring: (Mat &pixels, unsigned imheight, unsigned imwidth, unsigned num_channels)
memberdef.name: augment

detaileddescription.para:
Preprocess pixels according to the currently-set augmentation transforms.
pixels
The pixels to process as a column vector (num x 1 mat).
imheight
Height of the image in pixels.
imwidth
Width of the image in pixels.
num_channels
The number of channels pixels has.

Normalize poxels according to the currently-set transforms.
pixels
The pixels to process as a column vector.
num_channels
The number of channels pixels has.

External interface to saving an image. Classes that want to support this should use it to interface with internal_save_image.
pixels
The image to save (as a column vector).
filename
The image filename (type inferred from extension).
scale
Whether pixels has been scaled (default true).

memberdef.argsstring: (const Mat &pixels, unsigned imheight, unsigned imwidth, unsigned num_channels)
memberdef.name: cv_pixels

detaileddescription.para: Convert a column vector of pixels to an OpenCV matrix.
Undo cv_pixels.

Flip sqpixels.
flip_flag
OpenCV flip flag: 0=vertical, 1=horizontal, -1=both.
Apply the affine transformation in 3x3 matrix trans.

memberdef.argsstring: (Mat &pixels, const std::string filename, unsigned imheight, unsigned imwidth, unsigned num_channels, bool do_scale)
memberdef.name: internal_save_image

detaileddescription.para: Save pixels to filename.

Support class for preprocessing image inputs. Supports the following transforms:
Random horizontal and vertical flips
Random rotations
Random horizontal and vertical shifts
Random shearing
Standardize to 0 mean
Standardize to unit variance
Scale to the range [0, 1]
Normalize via z-score
